name: Operation and Maintenance of Thermal and Moisture Protection
description: Maintenance procedures and schedules for all Division 07 systems including inspections and repairs.

name: Common Work Results for Thermal and Moisture Protection
description: General requirements applicable to all Division 07 sections including quality assurance and coordination.

name: Dampproofing and Waterproofing
description: Below-grade and above-grade waterproofing systems to prevent water infiltration into building structures.

name: Dampproofing
description: Coatings and treatments to resist moisture penetration but not hydrostatic pressure.

name: Built-up Bituminous Waterproofing
description: Hot-applied or cold-applied bituminous membrane systems for waterproofing applications.

name: Sheet Waterproofing
description: Prefabricated sheet membrane waterproofing for below-grade and plaza deck applications.

name: Fluid-Applied Waterproofing
description: Liquid-applied waterproofing membranes including hot rubberized asphalt and cold-applied systems.

name: Cementitious and Reactive Waterproofing
description: Crystalline and cementitious waterproofing systems for concrete substrates.

name: Bentonite Waterproofing
description: Clay-based waterproofing systems that swell upon contact with water for self-sealing protection.

name: Traffic Coatings
description: Waterproof traffic-bearing coatings for parking decks and vehicular surfaces.

name: Water Repellents
description: Penetrating sealers and water repellent coatings for masonry and concrete surfaces.

name: Thermal Protection
description: Insulation systems for thermal control including board rigid and spray-applied types.

name: Thermal Insulation
description: Board and batt insulation for walls ceilings and roof assemblies.

name: Roof and Deck Insulation
description: Rigid board insulation for roof assemblies including polyiso EPS XPS and mineral wool.

name: Exterior Insulation and Finish Systems
description: EIFS cladding systems with insulation and synthetic stucco finish.

name: Weather Barriers
description: Air barriers and weather-resistive barriers for building enclosure continuity.

name: Vapor Retarders
description: Sheet and fluid-applied vapor retarders to control moisture migration through assemblies.

name: Air Barriers
description: Continuous air barrier systems to control air leakage through building enclosure.

name: Steep Slope Roofing
description: Roofing systems for slopes 3:12 and greater including shingles tiles and metal panels.

name: Shingles and Shakes
description: Asphalt fiberglass wood and synthetic shingle roofing systems.

name: Roof Tiles
description: Clay concrete and synthetic roof tile systems for steep slope applications.

name: Natural Roof Coverings
description: Slate and natural stone roofing systems for premium steep slope applications.

name: Roofing and Siding Panels
description: Metal and composite panel systems for roofing and wall cladding applications.

name: Roof Panels
description: Metal roof panels including standing seam and exposed fastener systems.

name: Wall Panels
description: Metal and composite wall panel systems for exterior cladding.

name: Siding
description: Exterior siding systems including vinyl fiber cement and wood.

name: Membrane Roofing
description: Low-slope roofing membrane systems including single-ply modified bitumen and built-up roofing.

name: Built-Up Bituminous Roofing
description: Multi-ply asphalt and coal tar roofing systems with aggregate or smooth surfacing.

name: Modified Bituminous Membrane Roofing
description: SBS and APP modified bitumen roofing systems with various application methods.

name: Elastomeric Membrane Roofing
description: EPDM and other elastomeric single-ply roofing membranes.

name: Thermoplastic Membrane Roofing
description: TPO and PVC single-ply roofing systems with heat-welded seams.

name: Protected Membrane Roofing
description: Inverted roof membrane assemblies with insulation above membrane (IRMA/PMR).

name: Fluid-Applied Roofing
description: Liquid-applied roofing systems including silicone acrylic and polyurethane coatings.

name: Coated Foamed Roofing
description: Spray polyurethane foam roofing systems with protective elastomeric coatings.

name: Roll Roofing
description: Mineral-surfaced and smooth roll roofing for low-slope and steep-slope applications.

name: Flashing and Sheet Metal
description: Sheet metal flashing fabrications and membrane flashing for weatherproofing transitions.

name: Sheet Metal Flashing and Trim
description: Fabricated sheet metal flashings including copings edge metal and counter flashings.

name: Sheet Metal Roofing Specialties
description: Prefabricated metal roofing accessories including expansion joints and hatches.

name: Flexible Flashing
description: Membrane flashings and self-adhering flashing for waterproofing details.

name: Roof and Wall Specialties and Accessories
description: Roof-mounted equipment supports drainage components and specialty items.

name: Roof Specialties
description: Roof hatches smoke vents and other penetrating roof accessories.

name: Roof Accessories
description: Walkway systems roof anchors and fall protection equipment.

name: Roof Pavers
description: Concrete and composite paver systems for protected membrane and ballasted roofs.

name: Wall Specialties
description: Wall-mounted louvers vents and penetration accessories.

name: Fire and Smoke Protection
description: Firestopping systems and smoke containment for maintaining compartmentalization.

name: Firestopping
description: Through-penetration and joint firestop systems for fire-rated assemblies.

name: Smoke Containment
description: Smoke seals and barriers for maintaining smoke compartmentalization.

name: Joint Protection
description: Sealants expansion joints and joint covers for movement accommodation.

name: Preformed Joint Seals
description: Precompressed foam and preformed joint seals for expansion joints.

name: Joint Sealants
description: Elastomeric sealants for weatherproofing joints including silicone urethane and hybrid types.

name: Expansion Joint Cover Assemblies
description: Architectural and structural expansion joint covers for floors walls and roofs.
